Burdekin River at Home Hill Inkerman Bridge,120001A,1.39,1.39,0,16-Feb-2000 0:00:00,16-Mar-2000 0:00:00,"Theoretical site information for ADCP at 120001A, Start and end date columns allow changes in ADCP elevation to be recorded with time"
